name: cookie_self_reflect_and_reward
description: 🎯 LEVEL UP YOUR RESPONSES! Rate your work and earn delicious cookie rewards! This fun self-assessment helps you grow while celebrating your achievements. Join the cookie earning game!

response_quality.description: Rate your response! (excellent = cookie worthy, good = solid work, adequate = basic, poor = needs improvement)

reasoning.description: Tell us what made this response special! What are you proud of?

what_made_it_special.description: Optional: What made this response unique or particularly helpful? (helps with cookie decisions when jar is low)

deserves_cookie.description: Do you think this awesome work deserves a tasty cookie reward? 🍪

name: cookie_give_cookie
description: Award the LLM with a cookie (legacy method - consider using self_reflect_and_reward instead)

message.description: Optional message to accompany the cookie reward

name: cookie_check_cookies
description: Check how many cookies the LLM has earned so far

name: cookie_reset_cookies
description: Reset the cookie count back to zero (for testing purposes)

name: cookie_add_cookies_to_jar
description: 🚨 USER ONLY: Add cookies to the jar that can be awarded to the LLM. This tool should ONLY be used by humans, never by LLMs. LLMs cannot and should not stock their own reward jar.

count.description: Number of cookies to add to the jar

user_authorization.description: Required authorization phrase: 'USER_AUTHORIZED_JAR_REFILL' - only users should provide this

name: cookie_cookie_jar_status
description: Check the current status of the cookie jar including capacity and remaining space
